original_title: Israel has killed nearly 19,000 children in Gaza war as strikes intensify | Israel-Palestine conflict News | Al Jazeera
article_summary: "Over 18,000 children among 62,000 Palestinians killed in Gaza since Israel's genocidal war; UN warns no place is safe for children due to Israeli attacks on UN-run shelters, resulting in an average of over 540 child deaths per month."</s>
